meanings.sent1: Her swarth complexion made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a touch of swarth to add depth to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to have a swarth complexion by playing in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered, casting a swarth over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The swarth of the night enveloped everything in darkness.

meanings.sent1: The swarth on the wall indicated a leak in the roof.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with mysterious swarths where sunlight couldn't reach.
meanings.sent3: The cat loved to hide in the swarth under the bed.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a swarth of ivy climbing up its walls.
meanings.sent5: The swarth of shadow beneath the tree provided a cool spot to rest.
